data.dataset: SELECT UPPER(d.[Transaction Type]) + CASE WHEN (d.DateFirstPrinted IS NOT NULL) THEN ' - COPY' END [TransactionType], CASE WHEN (d.DateValid IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE 'VALID:' + CONVERT(nvarchar(50), d.DateValid, 103) END EndDate, d.TypeId, --case when d.sPaymentMethod = 'ACC' then 'ACCOUNT' when d.sPaymentMethod = 'CSH' then 'CASH' --when d.sPaymentMethod = 'CRD' then 'CARD' when d.sPaymentMethod = 'EFT' then 'EFT' --when d.sPaymentMethod = 'CHQ' then 'CHEQUE' ELSE '' end --sPaymentMethod, d.DocumentNumber, d.Id SequenceNumber, d.DatePosted, d.TotalExcl, d.Total, d.TotalTax, d.ReferenceLong1 AS ReferenceOurs, d.ReferenceLong2 AS ReferenceYours, d.ReferenceLong3 AS OrderNumber, d.ReferenceLong4, d.ReferenceLong5, d.ReferenceShort1 AS RepCode, d.ReferenceShort2 AS SalesmanCode, d.ReferenceShort3, d.ReferenceShort4, d.ReferenceShort5, d.CreatedOn, d.Comment, cast(d.DateLastPrinted as nvarchar(50)) DateLastPrinted, d.VatNumber, d.BillingAddressLine1+ char(13) +d.BillingAddressLine2+ char(13) +d.BillingAddressLine3+ char(13) +d.BillingAddressLine4+ char(13) +d.BillingAddressCode BillingAddress, d.ShippingAddressLine1+ char(13) +d.ShippingAddressLine2+ char(13) +d.ShippingAddressLine3+ char(13) +d.ShippingAddressLine4+ char(13) +d.ShippingAddressCode ShippingAddress, d.ContactPerson,d.ContactTelephone FROM [CDS_SYS].VW_Document d WHERE d.Id = [Parameter01]

SELECT Quantity, l.Id, e.Title, l.Description, i.LocationMain, round(((100/((1-l.DiscountPercentage)*100))* l.Amount ),2) as Amount, l.TotalExcl, l.Total, l.TotalTax, l.DiscountPercentage*100 DiscountPercentage, CASE WHEN l.Total > 0 THEN (l.TotalTax/l.Total)*(100) ELSE 0 END VatPercentage FROM [CDS_SYS].VW_DocumentLine l INNER JOIN [CDS_SYS].VW_Entity e on l.ItemId = e.Id and l.SiteId = e.SiteId LEFT JOIN [CDS_ITM].VW_Inventory i on l.ItemId = i.EntityId and l.SiteId = i.SiteId WHERE HeaderId=[Parameter01] ORDER BY l.LineOrder

SELECT TOP 1 c.Code, c.Name, c.RegistrationNumber, 'Route: '+c.CustomValue1 CustomValue1, 'BTW/VAT#: '+ d.VatNumber , d.ContactPerson, d.Telephone, c.SalesTelephone, c.AreaCode FROM [CDS_SYS].VW_Document d left outer join [CDS_ORG].VW_Customer c on d.CompanyId = c.Id WHERE d.Id=[Parameter01]

SELECT TOP 1 s.Name, s.RegistrationNumber, 'BTW/VAT#: '+ s.VatNumber, 'TEL: '+ s.Telephone Telephone, --'FAX: ' + sFax1 as sFax, sa.Line1, sa.Line2, sa.Line3, sa.Line4, sa.Code PostalCode, s.VatPercentage, s.BankName, s.BankBranch, s.BankCode, s.BankAccountNumber FROM [CDS_SYS].VW_Site s INNER JOIN [CDS_SYS].VW_Document d on s.Id = d.SiteId INNER JOIN [CDS_SYS].VW_Address sa on s.ShippingAddress = sa.id WHERE d.Id=[Parameter01]
